required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Study on Efficacy and Safety in Patients Using NovoMix® 30 for the Treatment of Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: NovoMix® 30 UPGRADE (NovoMix® 30 Use for Progressed Glycemic Control in Realistic Administration to DiabEtes Mellitus): A Multicentre, Open Label, Nonrandomised, Non-interventional, Observational, Efficacy and Safety Study in Patients Using Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 (NovoMix® 30) for the Treatment of Diabetes Mellitus

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the efficacy on blood glucose control while using NovoMix® 30 FlexPen® under normal clinical practice conditions in Korea. A clinical safety profile will be also evaluated.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of serious adverse drug reactions
Number of all major (daytime and nocturnal) hypoglycaemic events
Number of major hypoglycaemic events related to omission of a meal after NovoMix® 30 injection
Number of major hypoglycaemic events related to physical exercise of at least 30 min
Number of all minor (daytime and nocturnal) hypoglycaemic events

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Lipid profile (Total cholesterol, LDL, HDL, Triglyceride) change
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients reaching the target of HbA1c below or equal to 6.5%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients reaching the target of HbA1c below or equal to 7.0%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients reaching the physician's own target recommendation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Variability in fasting plasma glucose values and average (mean) fasting plasma glucose level
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Average post-breakfast (2h), post-lunch (2h), post-dinner (2h) plasma glucose level
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study after 26 weeks
at the end of study after 26 weeks

intervention.description: Dose and frequency to be prescribed by the physician as a result of the normal clinical evaluation

study_pop.textblock: Any patient with type 1 and type 2 diabetes who are prescribed with NovoMix® 30

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Any patient with type 1 and type 2 diabetes who are treated with NovoMix® 30
- Patient who signed on informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are unlikely to comply with protocol requirements, e.g., uncooperative attitude, inability to return for the final visit
- Patients who were previously enrolled in this study
- Patients with a hypersensitivity to NovoMix® 30 or to any of the excipients
- Women who are pregnant, breast feeding or have the intention of becoming pregnant within next 12 months

intervention_browse.mesh_term: Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
